verses.verse: They say <S%H559><s%>, If a man <S%H376><s%> put away <S%H7971><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she go <S%H1980><s%> from him <S%H312><s%>, and become another man <S%H376><s%>'s, will he return unto her again <S%H7725><s%>? will not that land <S%H776><s%> be greatly <S%H2610><s%> polluted <S%H2610><s%>? But thou hast played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%> lovers <S%H7453><s%>; yet return again <S%H7725><s%> to me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto the bare heights <S%H8205><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%>; where <S%H375><s%> hast thou not been lain <S%H7693><s%> with <S%H1870><s%>? By the ways hast thou sat <S%H3427><s%> for them <S%H6163><s%>, as an Arabian in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and thou hast polluted <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with thy whoredoms <S%H2184><s%> and with thy wickedness <S%H7451><s%>.

Therefore the showers <S%H7241><s%> have been withholden <S%H4513><s%>, and there hath been no latter rain <S%H4456><s%>; yet thou hast a harlot <S%H2181><s%>'s forehead <S%H4696><s%>, thou refusedst <S%H3985><s%> to be ashamed <S%H3637><s%>.
Wilt thou not from this time cry <S%H7121><s%> unto me <S%H1><s%>, My Father, thou art the guide <S%H441><s%> of my youth <S%H5271><s%>?

Will he retain <S%H5201><s%> his anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>? will he keep <S%H8104><s%> it to the end <S%H5331><s%>? Behold <S%H1696><s%>, thou hast spoken and hast done <S%H6213><s%> evil things <S%H7451><s%>, and hast had thy way <S%H3201><s%>.

Moreover Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, Hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> that which backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%>? she is gone up <S%H1980><s%> upon every high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and there hath played the harlot <S%H2181><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> after <S%H310><s%> she had done <S%H6213><s%> all these things <S%H7725><s%>, She will return unto me <S%H7725><s%>; but she returned not <S%H901><s%>: and her treacherous sister <S%H269><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> saw it <S%H7200><s%>.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%>, when <S%H182><s%>, for this very cause that backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> had committed adultery <S%H5003><s%>, I had put her away <S%H7971><s%> and given <S%H5414><s%> her a bill <S%H5612><s%> of divorcement <S%H3748><s%>, yet treacherous <S%H898><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> her sister <S%H269><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H3212><s%>; but she also went and played the harlot <S%H2181><s%>.

And it came to pass through the lightness <S%H6963><s%> of her whoredom <S%H2184><s%>, that the land <S%H776><s%> was polluted <S%H2610><s%>, and she committed adultery <S%H5003><s%> with stones <S%H68><s%> and with stocks <S%H6086><s%>.

And yet for all this her treacherous <S%H901><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> hath not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me with her whole heart <S%H3820><s%>, but feignedly <S%H8267><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H4878><s%>, Backsliding Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath showed herself <S%H5315><s%> more righteous <S%H6663><s%> than treacherous <S%H898><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

Go <S%H1980><s%>, and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%>, thou backsliding <S%H4878><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; I will not look <S%H5307><s%> in anger <S%H6440><s%> upon you <S%H2623><s%>; for I am merciful, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, I will not keep <S%H5201><s%> anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Only acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, that thou hast transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and hast scattered <S%H6340><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%> to the strangers <S%H2114><s%> under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and ye have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Return <S%H7725><s%>, O backsliding <S%H7726><s%> children <S%H1121><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for I am a husband <S%H1166><s%> unto you <S%H3947><s%>: and I will take you one <S%H259><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> of a family <S%H4940><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you to Zion <S%H6726><s%>:
and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you shepherds <S%H7462><s%> according to my heart <S%H3820><s%>, who shall feed <S%H7462><s%> you with knowledge <S%H1844><s%> and understanding <S%H7919><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7235><s%>, when ye are multiplied and increased <S%H6509><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, in those days <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, they shall say <S%H559><s%> no more <S%H727><s%>, The ark of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; neither shall it come <S%H5927><s%> to mind <S%H3820><s%>; neither shall they remember <S%H2142><s%> it <S%H6485><s%>; neither shall they miss it <S%H6213><s%>; neither shall it be made any more.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> they shall call <S%H7121><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and all the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be gathered <S%H6960><s%> unto it <S%H8034><s%>, to the name of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: neither shall they walk <S%H3212><s%> any more after <S%H310><s%> the stubbornness <S%H8307><s%> of their evil <S%H7451><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall walk <S%H3212><s%> with the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and they shall come <S%H935><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

But I said <S%H559><s%>, How I will put <S%H7896><s%> thee among the children <S%H1121><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> thee a pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, a goodly <S%H6643><s%> heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the hosts <S%H6635><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>! and I said <S%H559><s%>, Ye shall call <S%H7121><s%> me My Father <S%H1><s%>, and shall not turn away <S%H7725><s%> from following me <S%H310><s%>.

Surely <S%H403><s%> as a wife <S%H802><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> departeth from her husband <S%H7453><s%>, so have ye dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with me <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

A voice <S%H6963><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> upon the bare heights <S%H8205><s%>, the weeping <S%H1065><s%> and the supplications <S%H8469><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; because they have perverted <S%H5753><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%>, they have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Return <S%H7725><s%>, ye backsliding <S%H7726><s%> children <S%H1121><s%>, I will heal <S%H7495><s%> your backslidings <S%H4878><s%>. Behold <S%H857><s%>, we are come unto thee <S%H3068><s%>; for thou art Jehovah our God <S%H430><s%>.

Truly <S%H403><s%> in vain <S%H8267><s%> is the help that is looked for from the hills <S%H1389><s%>, the tumult <S%H1995><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: truly <S%H403><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is the salvation <S%H8668><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
